News.title: News
News.description: Represents a news article or update on the Rishi Mishra website.

id.description: Unique identifier for the News entity.

titleEn.description: Title of the news article in English.

titleHi.description: Title of the news article in Hindi.

contentHi.description: Content of the news article in Hindi.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the news article.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the news article was published.  (ISO 8601 format)

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event related to Rishi Mishra or Sonchiraiya NGO.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Event entity.

descriptionHi.description: Description of the event in Hindi.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the event.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message submitted through the contact form.

name.description: Name of the person sending the message.

email.description: Email address of the person sending the message.

sentAt.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.  (ISO 8601 format)

Initiative.title: Initiative
Initiative.description: Represents a core initiative or program.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Initiative entity.

value.description: A short identifier for the initiative, used for tabs.

titleKey.description: The translation key for the initiative's short title (for tabs).

contentTitleKey.description: The translation key for the initiative's main content title.

descriptionKey.description: The translation key for the initiative's description.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the initiative.

order.description: A number to sort the initiatives.

HeroImage.title: Hero Image
HeroImage.description: Represents an image displayed in the hero carousel on the homepage.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Hero Image entity.

description.description: A brief description of the image for alt text.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation or search.

order.description: A number to sort the hero images in the carousel.

GalleryImage.title: Gallery Image
GalleryImage.description: Represents an image in the main gallery.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Gallery Image.

captionEn.description: Caption for the image in English.

captionHi.description: Caption for the image in Hindi.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the image was added.

actionLink1.description: Optional custom action link for the gallery image.

actionLink2.description: Optional second custom action link for the gallery image.

/news/{newsId}.description: Stores news articles. Includes fields for title (English and Hindi), content (Hindi), image URL, timestamp, and category.

/events/{eventId}.description: Stores event details. Includes fields for event name, date, location, description (Hindi), and image URL.

/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages submitted through the contact form. Includes fields for name, email, message, and sentAt timestamp.

/initiatives/{initiativeId}.description: Stores details about core initiatives. Includes fields for titles, descriptions, images, and ordering.

/heroImages/{heroImageId}.description: Stores images for the homepage hero carousel. Includes fields for the image URL, description, hint, and order.

/gallery/{galleryImageId}.description: Stores images for the main photo gallery. Includes URL, bilingual captions, and a timestamp.
